title: Quiz-Hub
description: Working with a team, we developed an interactive trivia app that allows users to log in and take or create quizzes!

title: eCommerceBackend
description: This is the product of a backend sequelize practice! Very cool stuff!

title: codeQuiz
description: A quiz built in JavaScript that asks you questions about JavaScript!

title: weatherDashboard
description: My first attempt at calling an API using API keys. Check out your local forecast with this one!

title: textEditor
description: A progressive web application that I built using webpacks. Starter code was provided for basic site structure, webpack builds were done by me!

title: techBlog
description: A basic blog website where a user can log in and out. A user can create posts and comments within the log in session! (Not mobile friendly yet!)
